string.text: Greetings Woodsman! I heard in conversation that you can modify suits. What do you offer?
Greetings to you, too... I can only modify only the suits of mercenaries. There are other craftsmen who specialize in other suits. I can attach PNV and reinforce suits, by making them more durable
Excellent, these are important upgrades...
What can you offer in updating suits?
Night vision, please...
Is it to be installed on a standard suit, or one I've already reinforced?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
Mercenary outfit...
French ARMY...
Suit U.S.ARMY...
The Scientific suit of mercenaries...
The Exoskeleton of mercenaries...
The Suit of mercenaries with gas mask...
The Modified suit of mercenaries...

I can offer for a suit of mercenaries:
- PNV 'Green' - 10,000Ru
- PNV 'Digital' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Sepia' - 15,000Ru
- PNV 'Halogen' - 20,000Ru
- PNV 'Cats Eye' - 30,000Ru
- PNV 'Psi-effect' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'Moonlight' - 25,000Ru
- PNV 'White Night' - 30,000Ru
Which would you like?
Standard 'Green'...
'Digital'...
'Sepia'...
'Halogen'...
'Cats Eye'...
'Psi-effect'...
'Moonlight'...
The best, please - 'White Night'...

Reinforce a suit...
What kind of suit do you want reinforcing - a standard suit, or one already fitted with night vision?
Standard...

Excellent... My quotations:
- the Mercenary suit - for an artefact 'Skin' and 5,000Ru
- the Scientific suit of mercenaries - for a Scale artefact and 40,000Ru
- the Exoskeleton of mercenaries - for a Steel Scale artefact and 80,000Ru
- the Mercenary suit with gas mask - for an artefact 'Skin' and 10,000Ru
- the Modified suit of mercenaries - for an artefact 'Skin' and 10,000Ru
Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
